Name: Bacardi Special
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Hit the perfect proportions and you will strike a wondrous balance of flavoursome rum, gin botanicals, limey sourness and fruity sweetness.
History: This vintage adaptation of the Bacardi Cocktail was first published in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book were he says it was " Made famous by Karl K. Kitchen, the well-known New York Newspaper Columnist. "
Nutrition: One serving of Bacardi Special contains 185 calories
